Content.Text:
<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's it, perfect! Well done, well
done!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah, hello <MYNAME>! Have you come to see
me?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Great, I'm happy to see you! I'm just
teaching my dog some tricks. He really
needs the exercise!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You keep chickens, don't you <MYNAME>?
Could I take a look at them?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great, thanks! Let's go right away.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, how cute! They look tough to
take care of, though!
Much harder than a regular pet
Want to give it a try?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Well... pets still need quit a lot of
work, you know? They're still animals.
<PAGE>
I guess chickens need a lot of care, to
get them to lay eggs and whatever, but I
think you could have put it better...

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, I didn't mean to upset you. I
know how tough it can be.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Things do look tough for you, though,
and I don't want to get in your way.
I'll just be getting home.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Come and see me again. I'll be waiting
for you.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow, you sure? Thanks, <MYNAME>! Tell me
everything I need to know, okay?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Phew, I thought it would be tough, but
you're not kidding!
<PAGE>
It was a lot of fun, too, though. I
learned a lot! Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'd better be getting home, anyway. Let
me take care of them again, okay? I'm
looking forward to it already!
